title: S4 Ep10: A Well Deserved Friday: Friday, January 15th, 2021
itunes:title: A Well Deserved Friday: Friday, January 15th, 2021
description:
• Joshua Bassett Drops New Song 'Lie, Lie, Lie' After Rumored Olivia Rodrigo Drama (US Weekly)
  • Bethenny Frankel made $7,250 on her first season of 'RHONY' (Page Six)
  • 'RHONY' cast member gets COVID-19, shutting down production (Page Six)
  • Bone appetit: Ben & Jerry's is now making dog treats (CNN Business)
  • Kristin Cavallari's NFL star ex Jay Cutler and Southern Charm's Madison LeCroy have 'new, flirty' romance (The Sun)
